main: ^Greetings, young advennturer. I am the oldest wizard in this land.
^I've seen countless adventures come and go, and I sense you are on a journey of great importance.
^Many moons have passed since I first set foot in this realm, and I've witnessed its many transformations.
choose: ^(But enough about me—how are you faring?)
good: ^I'm doing well, thank you for asking! The journey has been good to me so far.
bad: ^It's been tough, wizard. I've faced so many trials already, and I'm struggling with the weight of them all.
coward: ^I must admit, there have been moments of great fear along the way. Please, get me out of here!
wizard_answer1: ^My, what a fearless adventurer you are!
^It's been centuries since this realm has seen someone as bold and daring as you.
wizard_answer2: ^That saddens me to hear. Is there anything I can do to help you?
ty: ^Your generosity is greatly appreciated! Thank you for your kindness and support on my journey!
you: ^Thanks, friend. How are you faring in this strange place?
^The air here feels thick with mystery and danger.
help: ^Can you offer me guidance? I'm trying to navigate my way.
grateful: ^May your kindness be rewarded, my friend! It would be most helpful, and I would be truly grateful!
how_is_wizard: ^Me? It's a rarity for anyone to ask about my well-being.
^Your character is a marvel—compassionate and courageous. For that, I will offer you my guidance.
beg: ^Please, I beg you! I've reached my limit—I can't go on without your help!
wizard_help: ^I'd be happy to help you, young one.
^I'm giving you this item—you're very close to finding your way out of the labyrinth, and this will bring you even closer.
^I trust you; may your path be clear!
